name: iLikeOffers.co.uk
overview:
iLikeOffers.co.uk provides personalised offers to users to make it easier to save online and discover offers from their favourite brands. A range of discounts including voucher codes, sales, printable vouchers, daily deals and free delivery codes are listed to provide a comprehensive selection on site.

With over 3,000 offers and brands listed, unique technology is used to match offers with a user’s favourite products and brands. This provides the user with highly relevant offers that can be redeemed online.

Users can share the offers across multiple social platforms, including Facebook, Google+, Twitter and Pinterest. The number of social shares is then used to rank offers and brands listed on site, which enables the user to identify the most popular.
